Description: Yamaha SSC500 Electric Guitar Japan Made MIJ 1980's. Condition is Used. Shipped with FedEx Ground or FedEx Home Delivery. Lots of tiny dings and scratches. You can't see them unless really close. The push/pull knob is stuck in the out position. Lots of fret wear, but still plays awesomely. I have it set up with 12-54, straight neck. If you want me to set it up with 10's or 11's send me $20 extra and I will set it up for you as low as I can go and intonated. The bridge is kinda pitted. Obviously whoever had it before let the bridge allen screws rust into the bridge. I put the bridge pieceas in penetrating oil and took great care in getting the height adjustment allen screws out and put in brand new ones from StewMac. Two of the headstock tuners have the backs missing and the D strling tuner is slightly bent. The cover on the middle pickup wass broken so it has been superglued back together and is hardly noticeable. Great player. I always wanted one, got it, fixed it up as much as I could. Why am i selling it? I turned 68 last Sep., still playing professionally, but not as much. Plus I have 44 guitars and play my main strat and tele mostly when I do electric and several a/e's when I do my solo looping show. So look for lots more stuff. Lots of guitars will be put up and lots of pedals and amps too. Any questions, feel free to contact me. Shoot call me if you want, but please email me first for the number. Contintal USA only for this one. No case, but will try and find a bag if I can and will be carefully packed. Thqanx for your time and patience. Also, I will entertain lower offers. Just holler at me. Thanx again. The last photo is closer to the real finish colors than the ones with flash.
Title: Yamaha SSC500 Electric Guitar Japan Made MIJ 1980's Sunburst
